Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class NdefTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager
      • ohos.nfc.tag.NdefTag

  • public class NdefTag
extends TagManager
    Provides interfaces to create an NdefTag object, control connections to the NDEF tag, and read data from and write data to the NDEF tag.

    This class inherits from TagManager.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

    • Constructor Detail

      • NdefTag

        public NdefTag​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains an NdefTag object based on the given tag information.

        If the given tag is NDEF formatted, an NdefTag object will be created based on the given tag information; otherwise, an empty NdefTag object will be created.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates the information about the given tag.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Optional<NdefTag> getInstance​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains an instance of NdefTag object based on the given tag information.

        If the given tag is NDEF formatted, an NdefTag object will be created based on the given tag information; otherwise, an empty NdefTag object will be created.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates the information about the given tag.
        Returns:
        NdefTag object
        Since:
        3

      • getNdefMessage

        public NdefMessage getNdefMessage​()
        Obtains the NDEF message from this NDEF tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the NDEF message obtained from this NDEF tag.
        Since:
        3

      • getNdefMaxSize

        public int getNdefMaxSize​()
        Obtains the maximum NDEF message size.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum NDEF message size in bytes.
        Since:
        3

      • getTagType

        public String getTagType​()
        Obtains the NDEF tag type. Example types include NDEF_TYPE_1, NDEF_TYPE_2, NDEF_TYPE_3, and NDEF_TYPE_4.
        Returns:
        Returns the NDEF tag type.
        Since:
        3

      • readNdefMessage

        public NdefMessage readNdefMessage​()
                            throws IOException,
                                   IllegalArgumentException
        Reads the NDEF message from currently connected tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the NDEF message.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an I/O failure, or the operation is canceled.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the NDEF Message on the tag is malformed.
        RemoteException - if open RemoteException.
        Since:
        3

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage​(NdefMessage msg)
                      throws IOException,
                             IllegalArgumentException
        Writes the NDEF message to currently connected NDEF tag.
        Parameters:
        msg - Indicates the NDEF message to write, must not be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an I/O failure, or the operation is canceled
        IllegalArgumentException - if the NDEF Message to write is malformed
        RemoteException - if open RemoteException.
        Since:
        3

      • canSetReadOnly

        public boolean canSetReadOnly​()
        Checks whether this NDEF tag can be set to read-only.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this NDEF tag can be set to read-only; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • setReadOnly

        public boolean setReadOnly​()
                    throws IOException
        Sets the NDEF tag to read-only.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the NDEF tag is set to read-only; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an I/O failure, or the operation is canceled.
        Since:
        3

      • isNdefWritable

        public boolean isNdefWritable​()
        Checks whether the NDEF tag is writable.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the NDEF tag is writable; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3
